requirements: Materials fee: $75. Enrollment limited to 12. Prerequisite: ART 122 or permission of instructor.
description:
Exploration of time-based art mediums such as moving-image work, performance, sound, and installation, with emphasis on the integration and manipulation of different mediums and materials. Ways in which the history of time-based works informs contemporary practice. Individual studio projects as well as workshops in the use of various processes, practices, and techniques.
Materials fee: $75. Enrollment limited to 12. Prerequisite: ART 122 or permission of instructor.
title: Body, Space, and Time
